segments.text: I can't help but feel a little sad for the woman in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in her task, meticulously drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face is completely neutral, reflecting a mind perhaps occupied with mundane household thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea about the flood developing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she certainly doesn't know about the cookie heist happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, her foot is literally in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can one be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be a testament to how focused she is on her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But still, the impending mess and potential accidents make me worry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She will eventually discover the chaos, and I wonder what her reaction will be.
segments.speaker: PAR
